A simple block file copy: Force aspect to 16/9 and resolution to 720p
Speed-up video track by a factor of 2, remove audio -> MP4
Experimental 480p for tablets (480p/25 at 400kbps in main profile with low-latency)
useless string: -r 25 -deinterlace -c:v libx264 -profile:v main -preset slow -tune zerolatency  -pix_fmt yuv420p -strict experimental -b:v 400k -maxrate 400k -bufsize 800k -vf scale=-1:480 -acodec aac -ac 2 -ar 44100 -ab 96k -f mp4 -movflags +faststart

A simple block file copy: 480p for tablets (480p/25 at 400kbps in main profile with low-latency)
useless string: -r 25 -c:v libx264 -profile:v main -preset slow -tune zerolatency -pix_fmt yuv420p -strict experimental -b:v 400k -maxrate 400k -bufsize 800k -vf scale='trunc(oh*a/2)*2:min(480\,iw)' -acodec aac -ac 2 -ar 44100 -ab 96k -f mp4

A simple block file copy: High-quality SD for archive/storage (PAL at 1Mbps in high profile)
useless string: -c:v libx264 -profile:v high -preset slower -b:v 1000k -vf scale=-1:576 -acodec aac -ar 196k -f mp4

A simple block file copy: 1080p/50 to 1080i/25 interlacing conversion and mpeg2 compression with 4 mono audio streams
1080p50 to 608i/25 with SD safe zone padding, color matrix bt709 to bt601 conversion and mpeg2 compression muxed with one 4-channels audio stream
HD interlaced, not recommended on the video player due to CPU requirements
